comment.author: 60652095@N07
comment._content: "The rest of the men" stared at another camera man: www.flickr.com/photos/nlscotland/3011973171/

comment.author: 82596826@N03
comment._content:
Albatros DII, serial D.910/16 flown by Lt. Max Böhme of Jasta 5.  He was shot down & captured near Tilley on 4th of March 1917 after combat with Lts Graham and Boddy of No. 11 Sqadron RFC and Lt. Pearson  of No. 29 Squadron RFC.

Ref: Albatross Fighters - Windsock Datafile Special p.16 and 20

Others pix from the series:
